info.name: restaurant api
info.description:
This is the documentation of restaurant solution APIs.

It includes Auth API, User APIs, Table APIs and Reservation APIs

request.description: Login to the system and obtain the access toekn

Add user to system.

ONLY user with role admin can access this API.

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

response.name: Add user (invalid employee number)

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

response.name: Add user (invalid password)

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

request.description:
Returns all tables in the restaurant. deleted and un deleted tables. where deleted have the value deleted equal to ***true.***

ONLY user with role admin can access this API.

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

request.description:
Adds a table to restaurant. if table number exists it dose not add it; unless the existing value is for a deleted table at then it undeletes it an return adding conformation.

ONLY user with role admin can access this API.

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS
GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

variable.description: the number of the table that is requsted to delete

request.description:
Marks a table deleted IF there is no future reservation on it.

ONLY user with role admin can access this API.

variable.description: the number of the table that is requsted to delete

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

response.name: Delete table (reserved or dose not exists)

variable.description: the number of the table that is requsted to delete

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

variable.description: the primary key of the reservation to delete

request.description: Deletes reservations ONLY in the future.

variable.description: the primary key of the reservation to delete

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

variable.description: the primary key of the reservation to delete

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

request.description:
Returns all reservations. it supports pagination so page number must be supplied.

ONLY user with role admin can use this API.

item.name: Get All Reservations - Filter by tables

request.description:
Returns all reservations filtered by tables. it supports pagination so page number must be supplied.

ONLY user with role admin can use this API.

response.name: Get All Reservations - Filter by tables

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

item.name: Get All Reservations - Filter by date

request.description:
Returns all reservations filtered by date range. it supports pagination so page number must be supplied.

ONLY user with role admin can use this API.

response.name: Get All Reservations - Filter by date (invalid date)

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

response.name: Get All Reservations - Filter by date

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

request.description: Returns all reservations for today. it supports pagination so page number must be supplied. it also support order by time so order rule must be supplied.

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

variable.description: number of seats required by client

request.description: Return available time slots for today, starting from now. on tables that has the same number of supplied seats or more.

response.name: time slots

variable.description: number of seats required by client

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

response.name: time slots (no tables)

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

request.description: Add new reservation. it dose not allow creating of the new reservation if there is conflict on the table by another reservation.

response.name: new reservation

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

response.name: new reservation (time slot conflict)

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS
